description: This package is not maintained, use pydna instead (see below), which provides the same functionality. Contains classes and code for representing double                     stranded DNA and functions for simulating homologous                     recombination between DNA molecules.
longdescription: This package is not maintained, use pydna instead (see below), which provides the same functionality. Contains classes and code for representing double                     stranded DNA and functions for simulating homologous                     recombination between DNA molecules.
